Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentResponse] object to specify the results of sending a message to another user. You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] methods of your send message handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentHandling].

# INSendMessageIntentResponse

**Class**

Your app’s response to a send message intent.

## Declaration

```swift
class INSendMessageIntentResponse
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentResponse] object to specify the results of sending a message to another user. You create instances of this class when confirming or handling a send message intent. Use this object to communicate whether the message was successfully sent or whether an error occurred.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] methods of your send message handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntentHandling].

## Initializing the Response Object

- **init(code:userActivity:)**: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

## Getting the Response Code

- **code**: The code indicating whether you successfully handled the intent.
- **INSendMessageIntentResponseCode**: Constants that indicate the response state.

## Providing the Message

- **sentMessage**: The message sent by the intent.

## Instance Properties

- **sentMessages**

## Sending a Message

- **INSendMessageIntentHandling**: An interface to handle sending messages to one or more designated users.
- **INSendMessageIntent**: A request to send a message to the designated recipients.
- **INOutgoingMessageType**: The format of the message.
- **INSendMessageAttachment**: A file to include in a message.
- **INSendMessageIntentDonationMetadata**

## Inherits From

- INIntentResponse

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
